Replace.Text: Thor (Noisy Anthem)
Thunder

In addition to having the leader skill of Thunderbolt Thor, the Rainforest and Forest cells in the city cells gain +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins and +2 [ICON_Faith] faith, and all units have no movement consumption when embarking or disembarking from ships. After researching {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME}, all units have the ability to enter coastal and ocean cells. All military policy slots of the current government are converted to wildcard slots, and wonders and buildings with two or more [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] great work slots automatically gain [ICON_ThemeBonus_Active] theming. +3 for all [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture][ICON_GreatWork_Portrait][ICON_GreatWork_Landscape][ICON_GreatWork_Religious] artworks and [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] works, +3 for [ICON_Food], +3 for [ICON_Production], +3 for [ICON_Gold], +2 for [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Works slots for Palaces, +3 for [ICON_GreatWork_Sculpture] Great Works slots for Monuments, +6 for [ICON_GreatArtist] Great Artist points, all cities are built with an additional city center building (Monuments in Ancient times)
I'll treat you to dinner some other day~
Haha..Okay then...
Can I be your friend?
I knew you would agree.
Next time then..
Do you want me to get one more point?
Next is my turn!
come in
Not now.
Do you like playing games? I've got the best gaming console for you!
what do you mean?!
The guy who deserves a beating
Hello, I'm Thor, who are you?
This is Ain Sofi, come and feel the greatness of our city!
sure!
Can I visit your city? In return, I can take you to visit the Deep Space Eye building, but only the open part.
Are you willing to cooperate with me?
Are you here to cause trouble?
Now that you've said that, it's up to you to take action.
Your city expansion has affected me
Huh? Are you still not convinced?
I caught one of your men doing something naughty here. Do you need me to crush him?
You are challenging me...
Listen, I never believe in heresy, can you stop doing this?
Give up, no matter how hard you try, it's all in vain
I lost?
Well, itâ€™s a pleasure working with you!
Ok... maybe next time...
I know there is strength in numbers, but ganging up on one person is not my style. I advise you not to do that.
Thor was not happy with your involvement in the emergency.
